user_prompt: Docs QA for this repo. Goals: (1) check README, AGENTS.md, docs/* for gaps or drift; (2) ensure quickstart, config, and usage cover agents registry, --agents-dir, env vars, approval/sandbox modes; (3) suggest concise edits or addenda (Markdown snippets) to improve clarity; (4) call out any mismatched file references. Constraints: do not install tools; only read files. Output: list of concrete edits with file/section anchors and short snippets to apply.
